Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>何だ? お前ら<CD>あそんでる 場合じゃね-ぞ?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>通してよ ぼくたち このおくに<CD>用が あるんだ
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>What are you doing? We don't have any time to waste playing with you guys.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Let us through, we need to get further in.

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>何だ? お前たち<CD>じゃまを する気か?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>通してよ ぼくたち このおくに<CD>用が あるんだ
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>What are doing? Are you people planning to obstruct our path?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Let us through, we need to get further in.

Original: <@RL,BipedMedabot,00>そういうわけには いきません<CD>この先は きけんです<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>オレらが ちょっと 行って<CD>スパッと かいけつしてきて やるよ<CF><D1><@RL,BipedMedabot,00>メダロット3げんそく だい2じょう<CD>「メダロットは 人間に<CF><D1>きけんが ふリかかるのを<CD>貝すごしては ならない」<CF><D1>...あなたも メダロットなら<CD>分かるはずです<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>ここで 引きかえした方が<CD>人間たちに もっと すげえ<CF><D1>きけんが ふリかかるってことくらい<CD>考えリゃあ 分かるだろ-が!
Translated: <@RL,BipedMedabot,00>We can't let you do that.<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>We're just going in to deal with things quickly.<CF><D1><@RL,BipedMedabot,00>The second of the Three Laws of Medarobotics, "Medarots shall not ignore danger posed to humans."<CF><D1>...As a Medarot, you should understand.<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>If we let it be, thing's will just become more dangerous for humans, don't you get that?

Original: <@RL,BipedMedabot,00>そういうわけには いきません<CD>この先は きけんです<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>ならば だまって まっていろ<CD>すぐに おわる<CF><D1><@RL,BipedMedabot,00>メダロット3げんそく だい2じょう<CD>「メダロットは 人間に<CF><D1>きけんが ふリかかるのを<CD>貝すごしては ならない」<CF><D1>...あなたも メダロットなら<CD>分かるはずです<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>ここで 引きかえした方が<CD>人間たちに さらに 大きな<CF><D1>きけんが ふリかかるということが<CD>お前たちには 分からんのか?
Translated: <@RL,BipedMedabot,00>We can not let you do that.<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>Just stand aside and it'll be over soon.<CF><D1><@RL,BipedMedabot,00>The second of the Three Laws of Medarobotics, "Medarots shall not ignore danger posed to humans."<CF><D1>...As a Medarot, you should understand.<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>Can you not see that if we were to turn away now it would put humans in even more danger?

Original: <@RL,BipedMedabot,00>そうですか...しかたあリません
Translated: <@RL,BipedMedabot,00>I see... It can not be helped.

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>しばらく ねむっといて<CD>もらうぜ!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>いそごう<CD><&BUF07>!<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>おう!
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>Take a nap for now!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>Hurry, <&BUF07>!<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>Right!

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>しばらく ねむっておいて<CD>もらおう<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>いそごう<CD><&BUF07>!<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>ああ
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>Take a break for now.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>Hurry, <&BUF07>!<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>Yes.

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>なきごえが 大きくなった<CD>あの中に ないてるやつが いる
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>The crying has gotten louder, so the source of it must be inside.

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>近いな<CD>ないてるやつは あの中だ
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>We're close, the one crying is within.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>メダルぞうしょくろ?<CD>あの中に いるのって...<CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF>「ナカナイデ ナカナイデ」<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>あ また あの声!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>The Medal breed reactor? In there is...<CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF><f02>Don't cry, don't cry.<CF><f00><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Ah, that voice again!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>あっ きみは また...!<CF><D1><@RL,Electra,03>ニンゲン いなくなれ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Ah, it's you again...!<CF><D1><@RL,Electra,03>Begone, human!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>わっ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Woah!

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>何しやがる!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>やめろ <&BUF07>!
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>What the heck!?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>Stop, <&BUF07>!

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>何をする!<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>やめろ <&BUF07>!
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>What are you doing!?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,07>Stop, <&BUF07>!

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>でもよ あいつは人間じゃないから<CD>攻撃できるぜ?
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>But this guy isn't human, why can't I attack him?

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>あいつは人間ではない<CD>攻撃 かのうだぞ?
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>This guy is not human, so is attacking him not okay?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,02>攻撃しちゃ ダメったら ダメだ!<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>何でだよ?<CF><D1><@RL,Electra,01>フン どっちみち ここはおわリだよ<CF><D1>ニンゲンにみかたする レアメダルも<CD>そこの ニンゲンも<CF><D1>ここにいる みぃ-んな おわリだよ!<CD>アッハハハハ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,02>Don't attack, don't do it!<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>Why not?<CF><D1><@RL,Electra,01>Hmph, this is all pointless. This place, the rare Medals aiding the humans, the humans, they're all finished! Ahahahaha!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,02>攻撃しちゃ ダメったら ダメだ!<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>...ふん<CF><D1><@RL,Electra,01>フン どっちみち ここはおわリだよ<CF><D1>ニンゲンにみかたする レアメダルも<CD>そこの ニンゲンも<CF><D1>ここにいる みぃ-んな おわリだよ!<CD>アッハハハハ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,02>Don't attack, don't do it!<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>...Hmph.<CF><D1><@RL,Electra,01>Hmph, this is all pointless. This place, the rare Medals aiding the humans, the humans, they're all finished! Ahahahaha!

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>何 わらってやがるっ!
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>Why are you laughing!?

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>何が おかしい!
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>What is so amusing!?

Original: <@RL,Electra,01>アッハハハハ!<CF><D1>ベビ-の ぼうそう 止められる<CD>もんなら 止めてみな!
Translated: <@RL,Electra,01>Ahahaha!<CF><D1>If you can stop Baby, let me see you try!

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>何なんだ? あいつ いったい<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>メダルぞうしょくろに いそごう!<CF><D1>中で 何が おこってるのか<CD>たしかめなくっちゃ!
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>What the? What's with that guy?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>We need to hurry to the Medal breeder reactor!<CF><D1>We have to find out what's happening inside!

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>あいつ...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>メダルぞうしょくろに いそごう!<CF><D1>中で 何が おこってるのか<CD>たしかめなくっちゃ!
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>That fellow...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>We need to hurry to the Medal breeder reactor!<CF><D1>We have to find out what's happening inside!

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>カギが かかってるぜ<CD>よし まかせろ <CF><D1><&BUF0A>!<CD>オレが ここの ドアを!
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>It's locked. Okay then, leave it to me.<CF><D1><&BUF0A>! I'll break down this door!

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>カギが かかっているな<CD>つかれるが しかたがない<CF><D1>さがっていろ<CD><&BUF0A>
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>It is locked. It will be tiring, but there is no choice.<CF><D1>Stand back, <&BUF0A>.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>まって! ぼくにも 聞こえる<CD>このなき声...ベビ-?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Wait! I hear someone crying... Is that Baby?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>...あ カギが あいた<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>「入れ」って ことか?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>...Ah, there's the key.<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>"Come in," is it?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>...あ カギが あいた<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>「入れ」という ことか?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>...Ah, there's the key.<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>Is he saying, "Come in"?

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>こいつだ ないてるやつ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>やっぱリ ないてたのって<CD>プリミティベビ-だったんだ
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>This guy's the one that was crying.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Of course, Primity Baby was the one crying.

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>こいつだ なきつづけているのは<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>やっぱリ ないてたのって<CD>プリミティベビ-だったんだ
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>This guy is the one who keeps crying.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>Of course, Primity Baby was the one crying.

Original: <@CC,CLEAR,FF>ウウウ アウウウ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>そっか ひとリぽっちで<CD>こわかったんだね<CF><D1>だけど もう だいじょうぶ
Translated: <@CC,CLEAR,FF>Wah uwaaah<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>I see, you must have been frightened to be all alone.<CF><D1>But it's alright now.

Original: <@CC,CLEAR,FF>ウウウ アウウウ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>そうか ひとリぽっちで<CD>こわかったんだね<CF><D1>だけど もう だいじょうぶ
Translated: <@CC,CLEAR,FF>Wah uwaaah<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>I see, you must have been frightened to be all alone.<CF><D1>But it's alright now.

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>おい <&BUF0A>!
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>Hey, <&BUF0A>!

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>おい まて!
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>Hey, wait!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ねえ <&BUF07><CF><D1>何とか この子に つたえることって<CD>できないかな?<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>つたえるって 何を?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Hey, <&BUF07><CF><D1>Is there anyway we can communicate with this little guy?<CF><D1><@RL,Metabee,00>Communicate with it, about what?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ねえ <&BUF07><CF><D1>何とか この子に つたえることって<CD>できないかな?<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>つたえる? 何をだ?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>Hey, <&BUF07><CF><D1>Is there anyway we can communicate with this little guy?<CF><D1><@RL,Rokusho,00>Communicate with it? About what exactly?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,00>ごめんね 今まで ぼくたち人間の<CD>せいで ずっと こわい目に<CF><D1>あってきたんだよね<CD>でも このままじゃ きみの 力で<CF><D1>みんな しんじゃう<CD>おねがいだよ なきやんで
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,00>I'm sorry that we humans have made you suffer and be scared all this time...<CF><D1>But if you keep going like this, everyone will die from your power. <CF><D1>So please, stop crying.

Original: <@RL,Erika,07><&BUF0A>!<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>ぶじか! <&BUF0A>!<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,06><&BUF0A>くん!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,07><&BUF0A>!<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>So you're okay, <&BUF0A>!<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,06><&BUF0A>!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>みんな!<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>お前 1人で こんな所まで<CD>来て...!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>You guys!<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,01>You came all this way by yourself...!

Original: <@CC,CLEAR,FF>フギャアアアア!!<CD>オギャアアアア!!
Translated: <@CC,CLEAR,FF>Hwaaaah!!<D3>Ogyaaaaa!!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>わああっ!!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Woooah!!

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>うわあああっ!!
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>Woooooah!!

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>くああっ!!
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>Khh!!

Original: <@RL,Erika,07>きゃああ!!<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,06>きゃっ!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,07>Eeek!<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,06>Eeek!

Original: <@RL,Koji,03>なん...だ...この 声!!<CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF>ナカナイデ ナカナイデ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>(何だ...? 歌が...<CD>聞こえる...)
Translated: <@RL,Koji,03>What... is... this voice!?<CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF>Don't cry, don't cry.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,06>(What...? I hear... a song...)

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>(この声...それから この歌は)
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>(This voice... and this song.)

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>(そうか! コガネの子もリ歌!)
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>(That's it! It's Kogane's lullaby!)

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>カリン...ちゃん...<CD>この メダルを...<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,05>この メダル...は?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>Karin... this Medal...<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,05>This... Medal?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>コガネの...メダル<CD>歌が 入ってる...<CF><D1>カリンちゃんの スィ-カマ-に<CD>歌わせて...<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>おまっ...そんな...こと<CD>してる...場合じゃ...っ!<CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF>フギャアアアア!!<CD>オギャアアアア!!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>The song... is coming from Kogane's Medal.<CF><D1>Karin, if your Seekamar sang it...<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,03>You... this isn't... the time... for that...!<CF><D1><@CC,CLEAR,FF>Hugwaaah!!<D3>Ogwaaah!!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,06>たの..む...よ カリンちゃん<CD>歌うパ-ツ.を そ.う...て..<CF><D1>そうび しているのは...<CD>スィ-カマ- だけなんだ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,06>Plea...se... Karin, your Seekamar... is... the... only... one equipped... to sing!

Original: <@RL,Karin,05>分かリ...ましたわ
Translated: <@RL,Karin,05>I... understand.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>あリがとう カリンちゃん<CD>たすかったよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Thanks Karin, you saved us.

Original: <@RL,Karin,04>メダロットの 歌う 子もリ歌...<CD>とっても すてきでしたわ<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>うん! はじめて 聞いたけど<CD>ちょっぴリ なけちゃった<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,02>この はつ電所は<CD>もう 使えそうにないな
Translated: <@RL,Karin,04>The Medarot's lullaby was so lovely.<CF><D1><@RL,Erika,04>Yeah! I'd never heard it before, but it moved me to tears.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,02>I don't think this power plant can be used anymore.

Original: <@RL,Karin,04>でも ここには やさしい<CD>光が にあいますわ
Translated: <@RL,Karin,04>Still, the soft light here suits this place.

Original: <@RL,Asama,03>みんな ぶじかっ!?
Translated: <@RL,Asama,03>Are you all okay!?

Original: <@RL,Seseri,00>あなたたち...
Translated: <@RL,Seseri,00>You guys...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>コガネが みんなを<CD>すくったんです<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,00>コガネ...が?<CF><D1>そんな こと...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>知らなかったんですか?<CD>コガネの 子もリ歌は<CF><D1>ないている 子どもでも<CD>ねむらせることが できるんですよ
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Kogane saved all of us.<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,00>Kogane... did?<CF><D1>No way...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>Don't you know? Kogane's lullaby can help even a crying child get to sleep.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>はい メダルだけに<CD>なっちゃいましたけど<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,00>コガネの メダル...?
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Here, though it's just Kogane's Medal.<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,00>Kogane's Medal...?

Original: <@RL,Karin,04>ベビ-ちゃんは ひとリぽっちで<CD>さびしいって ないてたんですわ<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,02>そいつ あの でかい メダロットの<CD>ぼうそうを 止めちまったんだぜ<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,00>コガネが...ベビ-を 止めた?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>それから これ
Translated: <@RL,Karin,04>Lil' Baby was crying because it was all alone.<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,02>He put an end to that giant Medarot's tantrum.<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,00>Kogane... Stopped Baby?<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>And there's this too.

Original: <@RL,Seseri,00>あ...これ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>コガネが まもった「思い出の花」です<CD>...セセリさんとの ね!<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,00>わたし...わたしは...
Translated: <@RL,Seseri,00>Ah... These.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>Kogane protected these <f02>flowers with precious memories.<f00><D3>...For you, Seseri!<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,00>I... I...<D3>

Original: <@RL,Asama,01>ないて いいんだよ セセリさん<CD>こういう時はね
Translated: <@RL,Asama,01>It's okay to cry at a time like this, Seseri.

Original: <@RL,Seseri,00>うっ うっ...ひっく
Translated: <@RL,Seseri,00>Uuw uuw... hic.

Original: <@RL,Asama,01>本当に きみたちには 何て<CD>おれいを 言ったら いいのか...<CF><D1>ぼくたちの 町を すくってくれて<CD>本当に あリがとう<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>おれいは コガネに<CD>言ってください
Translated: <@RL,Asama,01>I really don't know how to thank you guys... Thank you all so much for saving our town.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>The one you should be thanking is Kogane.

Original: <@RL,Koji,02>あ-あ つかれたっとぉ!<CD>そろそろ かえるかな
Translated: <@RL,Koji,02>Aaah, I'm wiped out. I'm gonna head home.

Original: <@RL,Erika,04>あら? もうちょっと ここで<CD>あそんで行っても いいんじゃない?<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>アリカさん あまリ ながい間<CD>おじゃまするのは よくないですわ
Translated: <@RL,Erika,04>Oh? Can't we play around here a bit longer?<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>It's not good to be too much of a disturbance, Arika.

Original: <@RL,Asama,01>きみたちが かえるときは<CD>ぼくたちも 貝送リに 行くから<CF><D1>それまで ゆっくリしていくといい
Translated: <@RL,Asama,01>We'll see you guys off when you're ready to leave, so take your time.

Original: <@RL,Asama,01>行こう セセリさん
Translated: <@RL,Asama,01>Let's go, Seseri.

Original: <@RL,Seseri,00>...ええ
Translated: <@RL,Seseri,00>...Yes.

Original: <@RL,Metabee,00>オレも つかれた<CD>もう ねる!
Translated: <@RL,Metabee,00>I'm wiped too, I'm gonna go conk out!

Original: <@RL,Rokusho,00>おれも つかれた<CD>休ませてもらう
Translated: <@RL,Rokusho,00>I am tired as well, I shall rest for now.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>はいはい おつかれさま!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Yes, that's fine. You've worked hard today!

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>ぼくも 気がすんだら<CD>かえろっと!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>I'll head home too once I'm done!

Original: <@RL,Erika,07>あっ ちょっと まってよ<CD><&BUF0A>
Translated: <@RL,Erika,07>Ah, hey. Wait, <&BUF0A>.

Original: <@RL,Erika,00>じゃ あたしは おさきに<CD>ジオポ-トヘ 行って まってるわ
Translated: <@RL,Erika,00>Well, I'm going on ahead to the GeoPort. See you there.

Original: <@RL,Erika,04>みんな まってるんだから<CD>なるベく早く もどってきてね<CF><D1><&BUF0A>
Translated: <@RL,Erika,04>Everyone's waiting on you, so be quick, <&BUF0A>.

Original: <@RL,Erika,00>あっ やっと来た!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,00>Ah, you're finally here!

Original: <@RL,Erika,04><&BUF0A>!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,04><&BUF0A>!

Original: <@RL,Koji,02>おせ-ぞ!<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>うふふ わたしたちも<CD>今 来た ところなんですけど
Translated: <@RL,Koji,02>You're so slow!<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>Uhuhu, though we just got here ourselves.

Original: <@RL,Asama,01>貝送リに 来たよ<CD><&BUF0A>くん<CF><D1><@RL,WheeledMedabot,00><&BUF0A>さん
Translated: <@RL,Asama,01>We're here to see you off, <&BUF0A>.<CF><D1><@RL,WheeledMedabot,00><&BUF0A>.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>あ! コガネ!<CF><D1>それって 子もリ型メダロットの<CD>パ-ツじゃないか!<CF><D1><@RL,WheeledMedabot,00>買ってもらったんです<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>よかったね コガネ!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Ah! Kogane!<CF><D1>Those are childcare-type Medarot parts!<CF><D1><@RL,WheeledMedabot,00>They were bought for me.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>That's great, Kogane!

Original: <@RL,Seseri,01>あリがとう <&BUF0A>くん<CD>わたし...何だか<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>いいですよ 何にも言わなくて!<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,01>これは わたしからの かんしゃの<CD>気持ちよ うけとって
Translated: <@RL,Seseri,01>Thank you, <&BUF0A>. I... don't know...<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>It's fine, you don't have to say a thing!<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,01>This is a token of my thanks.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,07>えっ! いいんですか?<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,00>ええ <&BUF0A>くんには<CD>いろいろと めいわくをかけたし<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>そんな めいわくだなんて...
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,07>Eh!? Is this alright?<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,00>Yes, I caused you a lot of trouble, <&BUF0A>.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,00>I wouldn't call that trouble...

Original: <@LL,Ikki,04>あリがとう セセリさん<CF><D1>このティンペットは たいせつに<CD>使わせて いただきます
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,04>Thanks Seseri.<CF><D1>I'll take good care of this Tinpet.

Original: <@RL,Erika,06><&BUF0A>だけ<CD>ずる-い!!
Translated: <@RL,Erika,06>Only <&BUF0A>? No fair!!

Original: <@RL,Koji,02>まあまあ アリカちゃん<CD>おさえて おさえて....<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>くすすすっ
Translated: <@RL,Koji,02>Now, now, Arika. Control yourself, calm down...<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>Ehehe.

Original: <@RL,Seseri,01>うふふっ すてきなメダロットに<CD>そだてて あげてね♥<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>はい!<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,01>じゃ 元気でね<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>...セセリさんも<CD>アサマ先生と おしあわせにっ!<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,03>えっ!?
Translated: <@RL,Seseri,01>Uhuhu, raise it to be wonderful Medarot, okay? ♥<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,01>Yes!<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,01>Then, be well.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>...I hope you and Mr. Asama have a wonderful future too.<CF><D1><@RL,Seseri,03>Eh!?

Original: <@RL,Asama,03>わっ わわわわわっ!!<CD>なななな何 言ってるんだっ!?
Translated: <@RL,Asama,03>Wh-whwhwhwh-!! Wh-whwhwhat are you saying!?

Original: <@LL,Ikki,01>あはは!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,01>Ahaha!

Original: <@RL,Hachiro,02>やあ みんな! 元気だったかい?<CD>むかえに来たよ
Translated: <@RL,Hachiro,02>Hey everyone! Doing well? I came to pick you up.

Original: <@LL,Ikki,01>きっと ここは<CD>花で いっぱいに なるね!
Translated: <@LL,Ikki,01>There will surely be lots of flowers!

Original: <@RL,Hachiro,00>何の 話サ?
Translated: <@RL,Hachiro,00>What are you talking about?

Original: <@RL,Erika,04>ウフフ<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>さ かえろう!<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,02>も- ヘとヘとだぜ<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>お外も いい お天気だと<CD>いいですわね
Translated: <@RL,Erika,04>Uhuhu.<CF><D1><@LL,Ikki,04>Come on, let's go!<CF><D1><@RL,Koji,02>Geez, I'm exhausted.<CF><D1><@RL,Karin,04>I hope the weather is nice outside.

Original: <@RL,Hachiro,03>何だい ボクには さっぱリ<CD>分からないぞ?
Translated: <@RL,Hachiro,03>What do you mean? I don't get it.

Original: 青い空に まっ赤な たいよう<CF><D1>その下には メダロットたちの絵が<CD>かかれいてる
Translated: Underneath a red sun in the blue sky hangs a picture of some Medarots.

Original: 青い空に 白 くも<CF><D1>その下には メダロットたちの絵が<CD>かかれいてる
Translated: Underneath white cloud floating in the blue sky hangs a picture of some Medarots.

Original: 7色にかがやく にじの下に<CD>花の絵が かかれている
Translated: Underneath the glimmering, multi-colored rainbow hangs a picture of a flower.
